transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha Mukta ji good afternoon.
Customer: Hello? Mukta ji good afternoon. This is Yogesh from Sanyog Enterprises.
Customer: Okay okay. I am transferring your call to Mukta ma'am.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha Mukta ma'am good afternoon. This is Yogesh from Sanyog Enterprises Mumbai.
Executive: Yes sir.
Executive: Ha how are you ma'am?
Customer: Tell me sir. I am good.
Executive: Actually you will be the fine fine. Aap hi abhi hamare associate rahoge ki hamesha one year ke liye madam. I will be in touch with you like.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Okay theek hai to mujhe puchna tha ki online abhi ho gaya hai wo Saturday ko ya 25th ko 24th ko ye hamara catalog.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ha ha ho gaya hai.
Executive: Okay to abhi wo executive aapka jo physically aane wala tha na office mein to kab tak aayega? Kal aayega kya wo?
Executive: Uh physically unhone aapko bola tha ki main aaunga?
Customer: To kal bhi
Executive: Main unko phone karne boliye na mujhe phir direct pehle.
Executive: Uh main bata rahi hu sir. Actually uh inhone aapko kab bola tha ki aapse wo meeting ke liye aayenge sir?
Customer: Unhone nahi bola tha mujhe Kunal sir ne bataya tha ki once your this catalog is gone online within two days that person that local person will come to your office for the discussion and guidance.
Executive: Actually main batati hu guidance ke liye aapka service dekhne ke liye main assign hui hu sir. Theek hai? Main apna personal number aapko share kar dungi abhi. Theek hai? Aap mera number save kar lijiyega aur dusra cheez IndiaMART ke service usme aapko kaise use karna hai uski training dena ye sab kuch main hi karungi sir. Matlab head office mein aapka company aa gaya hai to yahin se hum sari cheeze karenge sir. Ha. To abhi aapka
Customer: Online hi rahega training pura bol rahe ho aap?
Executive: Ha ji ha ji sir. Video meeting pe hum click karenge. Usme main aapka jaise hamara do training hai sir. Ek welcome call one hota hai aur two hota hai and then. To isme kya rahega sir aapki mere sign aapki matlab aa jayega mere paas aapka detail aa jayega. This live hai aapki sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Isse pehle aap service liya hua hai kya first time aap join kiya hai IndiaMART sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi first time first time first time.
Executive: First time? To main aapko call kar lungi. Sir number pehle mera aapka personal number mujhe dal dijiye WhatsApp kar dijiye to main aapko contact karunga phir us cheez mein.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai baki aur koi issue nahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi main wahi isliye mere ko chahiye tha abhi aap bol rahe ho ki video meeting hoga to phir main us date fix karenge na ek aisa. Because mujhe Kunal sir ne kaha tha ki local person koi aayega physically.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapko sari cheeze hum kyuki hota kya hai na ye head office se hum all India ka sab kuch yahin se karte hai sir. Basically ho raha kya hai ki pehle to field mein aapke yaha pe hamare executive jaate hai. Unhone aapko service diya uske baad aapka company head office mein hai aur yahin se aapka sara kaam dekha jata hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Nahi currently mere paas physically koi initial to mera order online hi book hua hai madam. Right from the starter.
Executive: Ha matlab jaise hamara na overall India mein jo hai hamara branches hai. Theek hai? To jo field wale executive hote hai na wo aap training karte hai.
Executive: Aur yahin se aapko ek account manager pura one year ke liye diya jata hai taki aap jo hai koi bhi problem hota hai kisi bhi tarike ka to aap unse discuss karke wo cheez theek kara sakte ho sir.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai chaliye sir. To main abhi aapko WhatsApp kar deti hu apna number sir. Hai na?
Customer: Hmm okay. Main apna number WhatsApp kar deti hu taki aap mujhse directly connect kar le aur ho sakta hai agar aap aaj free ho to aaj main training de du koi problem nahi hai sir. Aap batao kitne baje free ho sir?
Customer: Ek lunch ke baad kar sakte ho aap phir aaj meeting video conference?
Executive: 3 baje karu?
Customer: Chalega. Aap 3 baje kar lena.
Executive: Ha ji main apna WhatsApp pe 3 baje phir kar dete hai phir ha.
Customer: Ha ha ha pakka. To main aapko abhi na ek message kar deti hu WhatsApp kar deti hu apne number se aap apna free ho kar ke mujhe bataye aur phir main video meeting ka link share karti hu and then isko complete karte hai sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Chalega theek hai. Okay thank you.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay sir. Bye sir.
Customer: Okay bye. Bye good.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about the executive's physical visit.

- Wants to fix a date for video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive will be assigned for guidance.

- Executive shared personal number for contact.

- Training will be provided via video meeting.

- Account manager will be assigned for one year.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to confirm availability for video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, training, video meeting, account manager
